name: ChemistryLognormal
description: Entity for describing an alloy with a set of log-normal size distributed particle types.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Chemical symbol of each chemical element.  By convension the dependent element (e.g. Al) is the first element.

properties.name: phases
properties.description: Name of each phase including matrix (e.g. fcc).  By convension matrix is the first phase.

properties.name: x0
properties.description: Nominal composition.  Should sum to one.

properties.name: x
properties.description: Average composition of each phase.  Each row should sum to one.

properties.name: r
properties.description: Mean (equivalent spherical) particle radius of each phase.

properties.name: r_std
properties.description: Standard deviation of the mean (equivalent spherical) particle radius of each phase.

properties.name: aspect
properties.description: Aspect ratio of each phase.  Assuming prolate-shaped particles.

properties.name: atvol
properties.description: Average volume per atom for each phase.
